fields.name: title
fields.description: A single 'preferred' place name, serving as title for the record

fields.name: title_source
fields.description: Label or short citation for source of the title toponym

fields.name: title_uri
fields.description: URI for the source of the title toponym

fields.name: ccodes
fields.description: One or more ISO Alpha-2 country codes, delimited with ';'

fields.name: matches
fields.description: One or more URIs for close/exact matches in place name authority resources

fields.name: variants
fields.description: One or more name variants, delimited w/';' & optionally suffixed with language-script codes

fields.name: types
fields.description: One or more contributor terms for place type, delimited with ';'

fields.name: aat_types
fields.description: One or more AAT integer IDs from WHG's subset list of ~160 place type concepts

fields.name: parent_name
fields.description: A single toponym for a containing place

fields.name: parent_id
fields.description: Either an external URI or internal WHG place_id pointer, e.g. #80110

fields.name: geowkt
fields.description: Any geometry in OGC WKT format.

fields.name: geo_source
fields.description: Label for source of the geometry, e.g. GeoNames

fields.name: geo_id
fields.description: URI identifier for source of the geometry

fields.name: start
fields.description: Earliest relevant date or date range (YYYY[-MM-DD/YYYY-MM-DD]); '-' prefix for BCE

fields.name: description
fields.description: A short text description of the place
